main event: Observers watched a bright fluorescent, pulsating light in the southwestern part of the sky for over four hours.
interesting points: The object was described as elongated football shaped and pulsated in blue, white, and red colors., Approximately four-fifths of the observers were astronomers., The observation was made using a telescope which revealed horizontal and lateral movement of the object., The object was seen first from a stopped automobile at a stop sign., The sighting began around 7:15 PM and lasted until 11:45 PM EST.
witness description: Civilians including a kindergarten teacher and a student observed the object.
